author: andyc
msg: Fixed scanPseudoAttribute (again) so that it doesn't hang on ']'
character. The upside of having a single method to scan literals
is that we only have one method for scanning literals; the down-
side is that everyone that calls it needs to handle all of the
"special" characters that could stop the scanning.

author: ericye
msg: new dumpTree method by Lisa Martin, lmartin@ca.ibm.com
